Title: Trainer Arrival and Set up
Description: The Training team will arrive today and need to set up the training room.

Title: Kick Off Meeting
Description: Kick off meeting with department heads.

Title: Set-Up
Description: Training team set up for walkthrough.

Title: Property Orientation Day
Description: Property walkthrough in groups with training team

Title: Workshop Day 1
Description: Property workshop full day 1

Title: Workshop Day 2
Description: Property workshop full day 2

Title: Systems Intro
Description: Systems Introduction - basic navigation, reading the house count, room types and statuses, finding and accessing reservations, reading the reservation screen, guest messaging, and guest history.

Title: Meet and Tour
Description: Review progress, training calendar, expectations and tour department area.

Title: Record Management
Description: Topics covered include blocking a guest into a specific room, room moves, cancelling a reservation, extending and adding a rate change, pre-registering a guest, and housekeeping service details.

Title: Meet and Tour
Description: Review progress, training calendar, expectations and tour department area.

Title: Test Meal
Description: Discussion of Food Show and Test Meals logistics

Title: Housekeeping Room Staging/Placement Review with Trainer
Description: Work with Housekeeping Leadership on room placement and property readiness check.

Title: Device Training
Description: Devices must be configured and set-up prior to this training and all applicable associates must be registered in the system.

Title: Housekeeping - Hotel Readiness
Description: Areas of focus: Organize Storage/Linen Closets, Housekeeping Cart Set-up, Public Space Clean Up and Readiness, Pool, Fitness Center, Elevator and Hallway Deep Cleaning, Room Placement and Readiness

Title: Banquet Zoning/Staging
Description: Trainer and property led. This time is to prepare the work space for an open hotel. This can include: Cleaning, Organizing, and Set-up.

Title: Guest Registration
Description: Review the Guest Reservation/record, field usage, and the check-in process including room selection, updating methods of payment, and accommodating walk-in reservations.

Title: Bar Set up - Prep and Oraganization (Beverage team)
Description: Trainer and property led. This time is to prepare the work space for an open hotel. This can include: Cleaning, Organizing, and Set-up.

Title: Getting to know your area - Local Concierge Presentation
Description: Property lead training. The hotel is encouraged to invite a person/company from the local area (or Concierge Team) to talk about the local area.

Title: Final Review Test Meals with FOH
Description: Insure all items are on property for Test Meal execution

Title: Hotel Tour- Rooms Review Front Office
Club Zoning and Staging
Description: Trainer and property led. This time is to prepare the work space for an open hotel. This can include: Cleaning, Organizing, and Set-up.

Title: Front Desk Readiness
Description: Prepare space for hotel opening

Title: Front Office Vendor Training
Description: Property Led. For training with any outside vendors.

Title: Front Desk Readiness
Description: Ensure all work space is hotel opening ready.
